Kids can make and receive calls with up to 5 pre-determined numbers.

 

Note, FiLIP 2 is not capable of sending or receiving 911 calls.

FiLIP 2 is supported by an iOS or Android App that lets parents set SafeZones, manage and set contacts, and send text messages to their child.

Parents can set up to 5 virtual boundaries. When a child enters or leaves a SafeZone, a notification is sent to the parent’s smartphone. The timing of notifications depends on location refresh settings in the app.

FiLIP 2
